attributes.action: Reduce the number of plastic bags used in Exeter and the surrounding area by 25%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Express & Echo newspaper has launched a campaign to reduce the number of plastic bags used in its circulation area by 25 per cent by June 2008.

We have joined forces with Exeter City Council, EDF Energy and Tidy Exeter Group to encourage as many people as possible to re-use bags or purchase eco-friendly bags for life.

If you’d like to join the Echo’s green army, please sign our petition and spread the word!
